title: Ticket #1202: The Schedd parser skips over multiple space in job_queue.log unneccesa
description: The classad log "journal" code stores classads on disk, and space-separates fields within a line. The code to read this journal from disk, in log.cpp allows for multiple spaces to separate entries. There shouldn't ever be multiple spaces, but if there are, the parser can get into trouble.
check_ins: 2010-Feb-10 13:04   Check-in [17184]: Fix problem when the schedd tries to parse an invalid job_queue.log #1202 (By Greg Thain )
creator: gthain
